Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I need to go through each case and look for repeated activities Let me start by listing out all the cases and their events Looking at Case C001 Verify Documents occurs twice Case C002 Call Customer twice Case C003 Verify Documents twice

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In C001 the first Verify Documents is initial check the second after customer submits additional info In C002 first Call Customer to clarify discrepancy second to confirm adjustments In C003 first Verify Documents initial second after adjustment

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Verify Documents first occurrence Initial Document Verification second ReVerification of Documents or PostSubmission Verification For Call Customer in C002 Clarification Call and Confirmation Call

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The second Verify Documents is triggered by preceding action post submission in C001 post adjustment in C003 so names should reflect the trigger for best process flow explanation

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Check for each case In C001 Verify split to Initial and PostSubmission good In C002 Calls to Clarification and Confirmation good In C003 Initial and PostAdjustment good Other activities only once per case no change needed

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Use concise descriptive names like PostSubmission Verification and PostAdjustment Verification to capture context without being too long consistent across cases where applicable
